G-dot Tech Staking

Hi there!


I am Jonas and I am behind G-dot Tech. Currently, I am providing staking services to everyone on the Kusama and Polkadot network.


A little bit about myself: I obtained a Ph.D. in behavioral economics and is interested in how users interact with blockchain protocols. One of my current research topics has the goal to offer a user-friendly process for nominators to make informed votes on their validators. I also loves to dig into data and make statistical analyses, for example, about on-chain user behavior and general economic metrics of the network.
